articles.title: Isaac Newton
articles.description: Isaac Newton was an English mathematician, physicist, astronomer, alchemist, theologian, and author who was described in his time as a natural philosopher.

articles.title: Alan Turing
articles.description: Alan Turing as an English mathematician, computer scientist, logician, cryptanalyst, philosopher and theoretical biologist.

articles.title: Albert Einstein
articles.description: He was a German-born theoretical physicist,widely held to be one of the greatest and most influential scientists of all time.
